DATA.TEXT: A strong aroma of coffee suddenly invades your nostrils as you touch down on this planet.
Welcome to Planet Caf√©! Please, feel right at home.
Ooh, this place smells so good!
Hahaha, I'm glad you like it! My name is Alinda, and I run the place. You know, it took a lot of effort to aromatize the entire planet.
Have you come to try one of our exclusive beverages?
Hey, my name is Hugo! A-Actually, we're here to deliver something...
